name: Comelito full (DLC Ver.)
description:
The comelitos have invaded the earth and only you can save the planet! Use power gems to destroy comelitos for a limited time and take all the gems in the levels to win and face king comelito, in this version  you can use the DLC mode to unlock new levels, game modes, and very  more

the dlc: https://sivlesoft.itch.io/comelito-dlc-pack
